Name: Pradhan Mantri KISAN Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
Objective: Provide income support of  Rs 6,000 per year to all landholding farmer families in three equal installments.

Name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
Objective: Provide comprehensive crop insurance to farmers against natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

Name: Ayushman Sahakar Scheme
Objective: Extend financial assistance to cooperatives for the creation of healthcare infrastructure in rural areas.

Name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maan-Dhan Yojana (PM-KMY)
Objective: Provide a pension of Rs 3,000 per month to small and marginal farmers upon attaining the age of 60 years.

Name: Soil Health Cards (SHC) Scheme
Objective: Provide soil health cards to farmers containing nutrient status of their land and recommendations for appropriate dosage of nutrients.

Name: Green Revolution â€“ Krishonnati Yojana
Objective: Holistic development of agriculture and allied sectors to increase farmers' income.

Name: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay SanraksHan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA)
Objective: Ensure remunerative prices to farmers for their produce through various procurement mechanisms.

Name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
Objective: Promote organic farming through cluster-based approaches and Participatory Guarantee System of certification.

Name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
Objective: Increase production of rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals, and commercial crops through area expansion and productivity enhancement.

Name: Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyay Unnat Krishi Shiksha Yojana (PDDUUKSY)
Objective: Promote agricultural education and training to build skilled human resources at the village level.

Name: Rashtriya Gokul Mission (RGM)
Objective: Development and conservation of indigenous bovine breeds to enhance milk production and productivity.

Name: National Beekeeping and Honey Mission (NBHM)
Objective: Promote holistic growth of the beekeeping industry for income and employment generation.

Name: National Mission on Edible Oils  Oil Palm (NMEO-OP)
Objective: Enhance edible oilseeds production and availability by promoting oil palm cultivation.

Name: National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF)
Objective: Promote chemical-free and sustainable farming practices through natural farming methods.
